points.content: Participated on the media production team, utilizing professional equipment in producing a clean and smooth livestream during Sunday morning services and events throughout the week.
Operated a manned camera, responsible for maneuvering and capturing moments on a large stage in a variety of different angles during worship and sermons messages.
Learned best practices in camera operation during productions, as well as how to professionally handle a camera and utilize it to make its output look professional, smooth and clean.
Experience with working in ProPresenter to design and run slides during Sunday morning services.
Directing livestreams outputs and operating cameras during Sunday morning services.

Started a 5-week computer learning program for 8 Spanish speaking kids ages 11-12 at a school in Managua, Nicaragua

Taught a computer class focused around introducing the concept of computers to kids, helping them to get comfortable interacting and working with the interface, then learning how to use specific applications for various purposes.

Took opportunities to minister to the kids during my time at the school, including shedding light in the midst of the darkness of the area they are living in.  I do this by simply being there with the kids, playing with them, praying over them, and impacting their lives with the gospel.
